original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>打草驚蛇計謀完美成功，清除了城內所有的細作並加強巡邏<color=#bceea7>12</color>個月！
text: Enlightenment, the subordinates have sent people to the <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> plan to kill the grass and startling snakes successfully, clearing all the details in the city and strengthening patrols<color=#bceea7>12</color> Months!
